articles.description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro said on Thursday evening that he will not take a coronavirus vaccine, the latest in a series of statements he has made expressing skepticism toward coronavirus vaccination programs.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
BRASILIA (Reuters) - Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro said on Thursday evening that he will not take a coronavirus vaccine, the latest in a series of statements he has made expres… [+913 chars]

articles.author: Lata Mishra
articles.title: Task force blames city’s poor health for high death rate - Mumbai Mirror
articles.description: Of the 10,739 Covid casualties, 55% had hypertension and 50% diabetes. Task force say lifestyle factors and poor diet responsible for Mumbaikars’ short lifespan.
articles.content: Of the 10,739 Covid casualties, 55% had hypertension and 50% diabetes. Task force say lifestyle factors and poor diet responsible for Mumbaikars short lifespan.Comorbidities are directly responsible … [+2237 chars]
